name: Dead TD
description:
Dead TD is a tower defense game that was inspired by the old school original maps from WC3. It features a wide range of towers that upgrade into more powerful types and features a range of different abilities that can be used to create the ultimate defense.



Dynamic Pathing
No need to pause the game, simply build a tower and watch the monsters change their paths.



Tower Blocking
Build towers and create a maze to get the most damage and time on the monsters.



Lots of Towers and Effects
Many towers with lots of different effects. Build a defense that synergizes together and crushes monsters.



Features over 20 different maps, with at least 30 different towers with upgrades and many different effects!
